name: energy-powder
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 50 HP.  Decreases happiness by 5/5/10.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A bitter powder
that restores HP
by 50 points.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A bitter powder
that restores HP
by 50 points.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A very bitter medicine powder.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 50 points.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A bitter medicine powder.
When consumed, it restores

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A very bitter medicinal powder. When consumed,
it restores up to 60 HP to an injured Pokémon.

A very bitter medicinal powder. When consumed,

flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
A very bitter medicinal powder. It can be used to
restore 60 HP to a single Pokémon.
